Structs/JWT.html#/s:15Infra_DID_Swift3JW.abstract: Sign the JWT using the given algorithm and encode the header, claims and signature as a JWT String.

Structs/JWT.html#/s:15Infra_DID_Swift3JW.abstract: Verify the signature of the encoded JWT using the given algorithm.

Structs.html#/s:15Infra_DID_Swift18Verif.name: VerifiedCredential
Structs.html#/s:15Infra_DID_Swift18Verif.abstract: Represents the result of a Credential verification. It includes the properties produced by did-jwt and a W3C compliant representation of the Credential that was just verified.

Structs/VerifiedPresentation.html.name: VerifiedPresentation
Structs/VerifiedPresentation.html.abstract: Represents the result of a Presentation verification. It includes the properties produced by did-jwt and a W3C compliant representation of the Presentation that was just verified.

Structs.html#/s:15Infra_DID_Swift22JwtPr.name: JwtPresentationPayload
Structs.html#/s:15Infra_DID_Swift22JwtPr.abstract: A JWT payload representation of a Presentation

Structs.html#/s:15Infra_DID_Swift20JwtCr.name: JwtCredentialPayload

Structs/PresentationPayload.html.name: PresentationPayload

Structs.html#/s:15Infra_DID_Swift19Prese.abstract: Represents the Verification Options that can be passed to the verifyPresentation And CreateVPJWT method.

Structs/Header.html.name: Header
Structs/Header.html.abstract: A representation of a JSON Web Token header.

Structs/JWT.html.name: JWT
Structs/JWT.html.abstract: A struct representing the Header and Claims of a JSON Web Token.

Protocols/Claims.html#/s:15Infra_DID_Swi.name: exp
Protocols/Claims.html#/s:15Infra_DID_Swi.abstract: The “exp” (expiration time) claim identifies the expiration time on

Protocols/Claims.html#/s:15Infra_DID_Swi.name: nbf
Protocols/Claims.html#/s:15Infra_DID_Swi.abstract: The “nbf” (not before) claim identifies the time before which the JWT

Protocols/Claims.html#/s:15Infra_DID_Swi.name: iat
Protocols/Claims.html#/s:15Infra_DID_Swi.abstract: The “iat” (issued at) claim identifies the time at which the JWT was

Protocols/Claims.html#/s:15Infra_DID_Swi.name: encode()
Protocols/Claims.html#/s:15Infra_DID_Swi.abstract: Encode the Claim object as a Base64 String.

Protocols/Claims.html.name: Claims
Protocols/Claims.html.abstract: A protocol for representing the claims on a JSON web token.

Functions.html#/s:15Infra_DID_Swift29cre.name: createVerifiableCredentialJwt(payload:issuer:)
Functions.html#/s:15Infra_DID_Swift29cre.abstract: Creates a VerifiableCredential given a CredentialPayload or JwtCredentialPayload and an Issuer.

Functions.html#/s:15Infra_DID_Swift31cre.name: createVerifiablePresentationJwt(payload:holder:options:)
Functions.html#/s:15Infra_DID_Swift31cre.abstract: Creates a VerifiablePresentation JWT given a PresentationPayload or JwtPresentationPayload and an Issuer.

Functions.html#/s:15Infra_DID_Swift32ver.name: verifyPresentationPayloadOptions(payload:options:)
Functions.html#/s:15Infra_DID_Swift32ver.abstract: Method Verifies that the given JwtPresentationPayload contains the appropriate options from VerifyPresentationOption

Functions.html#/s:15Infra_DID_Swift22nor.name: normalizedPresentation(jwt:removeOriginalFields:)
Functions.html#/s:15Infra_DID_Swift22nor.abstract: Normalizes a presentation payload into an unambiguous W3C Presentation data type

Functions.html#/s:15Infra_DID_Swift19nor.name: normalizeCredential(input:jwt:)
Functions.html#/s:15Infra_DID_Swift19nor.abstract: Method Normalizes a credential payload into an unambiguous W3C credential data type In case of conflict, Existing W3C Credential specific properties take precedence, except for arrays and object types which get merged

Functions.html#/s:15Infra_DID_Swift18ver.name: verifyPresentation(presentation:resolver:options:)
Functions.html#/s:15Infra_DID_Swift18ver.abstract: Method Verifies and validates a VerifiablePresentation that is encoded as a JWT according to the W3C spec.

Functions.html#/s:15Infra_DID_Swift16ver.name: verifyCredential(credential:resolver:options:)
Functions.html#/s:15Infra_DID_Swift16ver.abstract: Method Verifies and validates a VerifiableCredential that is encoded as a JWT according to the W3C spec.

Functions.html#/s:15Infra_DID_Swift26tra.name: transformPresentationInput(input:removeOriginalFields:)
Functions.html#/s:15Infra_DID_Swift26tra.abstract: Method Transforms a W3C Presentation payload into a JWT compatible encoding. The method accepts app specific fields and in case of collision, existing JWT properties will take precedence. Also, nbf, exp and jti properties can be explicitly set to undefined and they will be kept intact.

Functions.html#/s:15Infra_DID_Swift24tra.name: transformCredentialInput(input:)
Functions.html#/s:15Infra_DID_Swift24tra.abstract: Method Transforms a W3C Credential payload into a JWT compatible encoding. The method accepts app specific fields and in case of collision, existing JWT properties will take precedence. Also, nbf, exp and jti properties can be explicitly set to undefined and they will be kept intact.

Functions.html#/s:15Infra_DID_Swift9deco.name: decodeJwt(jwt:)
Functions.html#/s:15Infra_DID_Swift9deco.abstract: Decodes a JWT and returns an object representing the payload

Functions.html#/s:15Infra_DID_Swift9crea.name: createJws(payload:signer:header:)
Functions.html#/s:15Infra_DID_Swift9crea.abstract: Creates a signed JWS given a payload, a signer, and an optional header.

Functions.html#/s:15Infra_DID_Swift9crea.name: createJwt(payload:jwtOptions:header:)
Functions.html#/s:15Infra_DID_Swift9crea.abstract: Creates a signed JWT given an address which becomes the issuer, a signer, and a payload for which the signature is over.

Functions.html#/s:15Infra_DID_Swift9veri.name: verifyJwt(jwt:options:)
Functions.html#/s:15Infra_DID_Swift9veri.abstract: Verifies given JWT. If the JWT is valid, the promise returns an object including the JWT, the payload of the JWT, and the did doc of the issuer of the JWT.

Functions.html#/s:15Infra_DID_Swift20res.name: resolveAuthenticator(resolver:alg:issuer:proofPurpose:)
Functions.html#/s:15Infra_DID_Swift20res.abstract: Resolves relevant public keys or other authenticating material used to verify signature from the DID document of provided DID

Classes/InfraDIDResolver.html#/s:15Infra.abstract: Resolved DIDDocument Based On PubKeyDID Using PromiseChain

Classes/ECSigner.html#/s:15Infra_DID_Swi.abstract: send utf8 encoded header.claims to BlueECC for signing
